phrs.translation: 努力, 奋斗, 斗争

sentences.sentence: Beck and Gamma have striven to maintain both forwards and backwards compatibility.
sentences.translation: Beck和Gamma努力维持向前和向后兼容。

sentences.sentence: More than any of her Democratic rivals, Mrs Clinton has striven to neutralise the Republicans' advantage here.
sentences.translation: 希拉里努力地抵消共和党在这方面的优势，程度超过了她党内的对手。

sentences.sentence: Mr Trichet has striven to build consensus on the rate-setting council, sometimes calling up members to iron out problems.
sentences.translation: 特里谢在利率制定会议上努力建立共识，有时会召集成员解决问题。
